name: Forbidden Garden
description:
This is a remake of a 2d game of many years back, probably pirate.

 At least I believe so. It was the era of Commodore64, it was 1984 or 1985.

In that game You were advancing in a garden only apparently quiet and beautiful, because in the reality  it was infested by monsters and exterminating angels ready  to kill us at all costs! You were impersonating a sort of Eva equipped with ESP power...

Sometime  I have a doubt: It cames from my memories or from  my nightmares?

Gameplay was similar to Forbidden Forest an old great game for home devices but You can even more than shot, also using a protection shield that allow You to teleport.

But I remember well some of its proud creature, which were very dangerous, hence terrifying.
I remember the essential but fun gameplay with a constant anxiety induced by it.
Today, trying to put some order into my memories, I tried to recreate  that strange and forgotten game,  making the gameplay more flowing  and current but trying to preserve its style.

I hope You enjoy!

No payments but, if You want, make in your own an offer to Ukrainians or other suffering people in the world.
